title: Visa, AWS launch infrastructure for AI-driven agentic commerce
description: Visa and Amazon Web Services (AWS) have announced a new partnership aimed at making it easier for companies to build and deploy “agentic commerce” systems. Agentic commerce refers to purchases through artificial intelligence (AI) agents that can autonomously …
